From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Well, apparantly you can't get to experience level 600 with a hired 
character without crashing the game.  The problem: your total score 
gets too high for the game to handle.  

Even wierder, apparantly, somehow it has messed with the saved game 
file at that point.  It only lists me as going through one scenario 
with that character on the gladiator file checker.  All of this was 
done with a thief.
